resources.string: Ein nýggj útgáva av %s er tøk.\nVilja tygum uppstiga?

Please contact application developer!

OI Update - List of new versions
OI Update - New versions at AndAppStore

OI Update - List of managed applications (check at AndAppStore)
Updates are currently ignored. Would you like to receive updates again?
No update information available. Please check manually and ask the developer to support OI Update in the future.
The update process of this application directs to a different site than Android Market. Applications installed from unknown sources might exhibit a security risk.
If checked, search for updates is performed regularly
Set the interval how often the update search should be performed.
If you uncheck this item, you will no longer receive notifications for updates. Do you still want to uncheck auto update?

Version %s 

 OI Update keeps you informed on new application versions.

OpenIntents allows different Android applications to share data using intents and open interfaces.

 For more information and other great applications visit OpenIntents at www.openintents.org
